subject: Important information
body:
Esteemed Beneficiary,

You have been awarded a compensation fund worth $5.3million.

My name is Jerome Powell, Chairman The Federal Reserve of the United
States. Your payment file was brought to my desk and I am surprised that
you are still struggling to receive your long awaited payment after all you
have passed through.

However, I am very sure that you have lost hope of ever getting your fund
successfully transferred or released to your account after all the
frustrations, endless disappointments and broken promises in the hands of
certain officials in the past.

After all the checks and balances, I discovered that the reason you have
not received your long awaited fund was because the officials you were
dealing with refused to tell you the truth of the matter. Instead they used
it as an opportunity to extort money from you in order to enrich themselves.

Kindly get back to me so that I can state categorically what you need to do
in order to receive the above mentioned compensation fund that has been
awarded to you.

Kindly contact me with your full name, address and telephone at my private
email below for a more elaborate explanation.

Email: usafrsve.jerome@gmail.com

Best Regards,

Jerome Powell
Chair of the Federal Reserve.

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The contents of this email message and any
attachments are intended solely for the addressee(s) and may contain
confidential and/or privileged information and may be legally protected
from disclosure.
